xwikidoc.name: ccmArchive20140225
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 25 February 2014
xwikidoc.content: <qwebirc19402> has joined #ccm 02:55 <qwebirc71202> has joined #ccm 02:55 <qwebirc71202> HI Everyone 02:56 <qwebirc71202> I would like to learn more about "Visualising the Evolution of Tumors" project 02:56 <qwebirc71202> Where can I get the wiki or the expectation list for the particular project 03:55 <raghav> has joined #ccm 03:57 <raghav> Hi everyone 05:24 <raghav> has joined #ccm 05:58 <raghav> has joined #ccm 08:08 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 08:14 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 08:29 <nclandrei_> has joined #ccm 08:29 <nclandrei_> hi everyone 08:29 <nclandrei_> this is the right place to ask about GSoC projects, right? 08:40 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 10:24 <nclandrei_> has joined #ccm 10:25 <nclandrei__> has joined #ccm 10:37 <rays2pix> has joined #ccm 10:37 <rays2pix> Hi I am interested in the project "Developing machine learning methods" 10:50 <sdumitriu_[away]> Hi rays2pix 11:04 <rays2pix> Hi Sdumitriu 11:06 <sdumitriu> That is Quaid's project, he's rarely on IRC, so you should write by email to quaid.morris@utoronto.ca and CC ccm-mentors@cs.toronto.edu 11:08 <rays2pix> Thank you. I have already mailed to ccm-mentors. Will forward it to quaid. 11:10 <sdumitriu> You're Deepak? 11:14 <rays2pix> yes 11:18 <rays2pix> sdumitriu, :Which project will you be mentoring? 11:19 <sdumitriu> I don't know yet, it depends on what students like 11:19 <sdumitriu> But I'm mostly a PhenoTips developer 11:20 <rays2pix> oh okay 11:25 <root_l> has joined #ccm 11:26 <root_l> hope i landed where its about "Computational Medecine" 11:26 <root_l> i was directed here from a GSOC page 11:26 <sdumitriu> Hi root_l, yes 11:27 <root_l> am a newbiew to GSOC and after visiting your ideas page, i think i liked one or two ideas from there 11:30 <sdumitriu> Which ones? 11:31 <root_l> i was particulary attracted by the "Diagnostic apps for medical genomics" 11:31 <root_l> and also the "mobile UI for the pedigree tool" 11:32 <sosna> has joined #ccm 11:33 <root_l> i need more info about these , like what are the pre-requisites, already existing prototypes and stuff like that 11:41 <sdumitriu> Hold on, talking with someone else 11:42 <root_l> ok 11:58 <sdumitriu> root_l: OK, for the Diagnostic apps, you should contact Ron directly by email (CC ccm-mentors), since that's his personal project 11:59 <sdumitriu> For the pedigree, you should /join #phenotips 11:59 <root_l> sdumitriu: ok . i'll try 12:00 <root_l> sdumitriu: but don't they come here? 12:00 <sdumitriu> Rarely, this year we were actually going to not use the IRC channel 12:00 <sdumitriu> It's just me here redirecting students to the proper place 12:01 <root_l> sdumitriu: oh, ok i c 12:01 <sdumitriu> This younger generation doesn't like IRC anymore... 12:02 <root_l> sdumitriu: but i have been redirected to another channel. am on it now 13:18 <sosna> has joined #ccm 14:03 <nclandrei> has joined #ccm 14:03 <nclandrei> hi everyone 14:04 <sdumitriu> Hi nclandrei 14:04 <nclandrei> is this the right place to talk about GSoC projects? 14:04 <nclandrei> (-: 14:05 <sdumitriu> Yes 14:05 <sdumitriu> Kind of 14:05 <sdumitriu> Quaid isn't usually here 14:06 <root_l> we're on #phenotips 14:06 <nclandrei> I have researched on the list published on Melange and I came to the conclusion that the best opportunity would be to work with you, guys 14:06 <nclandrei> oh, should I come there? 14:06 <sdumitriu> He's usually busy (as a professor/researcher), so the best way to contact him is by personal email (it's listed under the project) 14:06 <sdumitriu> But I can help you a bit 14:07 <sdumitriu> You're a first year student, right? 14:07 <nclandrei> Well I have sent an email, but I've received no reply so I wanted to get help from anywhere possible 14:07 <nclandrei> yes, I am 14:07 <nclandrei> first year student at Jacobs university, in Bremen 14:09 <sdumitriu> I'm not sure what Quaid expects for his projects, but my honest opinion is that you'd need a bit more experience for those 14:10 <sdumitriu> Especially with machine learning and computer vision 14:10 <nclandrei> well I have seen the requirements and they do not seem possible.. I have studied computer science since 7/8th grade 14:10 <nclandrei> and now I am working for the german research center for artificial intelligence and robotics 14:11 <nclandrei> + I have completed a courseera machine learning course, so I kind of have some experience 14:11 <sdumitriu> OK, that's good 14:13 <nclandrei> now I am working with image processing, using openCV mainly, so I am used to these types of projects 14:13 <nclandrei> + I am very, extremely keen to learn more in order to be able to participate in one of your projects 14:13 <sdumitriu> Oh, that's interesting 14:13 <nclandrei> because the idea and having the chance to work on such a helpful project for other people's health is amazing 14:14 <sdumitriu> So you're quite advanced for a first year student 14:14 <nclandrei> even back in Romania I have participated in a lot of contests etc. for CS 14:14 <nclandrei> so yes (-: 14:14 <nclandrei> offtopic: my mother is a CS teacher haha 14:18 <sdumitriu> So, you don't like any of the PhenoTips projects? 14:20 <nclandrei> well I was also very interested in this one: Multiple visits support in PhenoTips 14:20 <nclandrei> I think I can handle what pre-req. are there 14:21 <nclandrei> unfortunately, I don't have that much experience with jGit, but I can start learning before the program starts 14:21 <sdumitriu> Yes, that's a hard but interesting project 14:23 <nclandrei> so what would be the following steps, what should I do in order to maybe increase my chances of being accepted? 14:23 <vishnu93> has joined #ccm 14:24 <sdumitriu> Well, contact Quaid for his projects, or join #phenotips for that kind of projects 14:25 <nclandrei> so if I've already sent Mr. Morris an email, should I hop on the other channel, the Phenotips one? (-: 14:25 <sdumitriu> Yes, if you really like the idea 14:25 <sdumitriu> Hi vishnu93, how can I help you? 14:41 <vishnu93> Hi 14:42 <vishnu93> I'm a fourth year student pursuing B.E. Computer Science 14:42 <vishnu93> I was interested in the Machine Learning Project for Modeling Tumors 14:43 <vishnu93> I've worked on projects on Machine Learning, for which I used python's scikit learn 14:44 <vishnu93> I've contacted Mr. Morris about the idea 14:45 <sdumitriu> OK, I guess you should wait for an answer from him 14:45 <vishnu93> Yeah 14:45 <vishnu93> Thanks :) 22:01 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm
